description: An appeals court releases Rokia Traor¨¦ but says an extradition to Belgium can go ahead.
title: Rokia Traor¨¦: Paris court releases Mali singer but backs extradition
title_page: Rokia Traor¨¦: Paris court releases Mali singer but backs extradition - BBC News
maintext: Addressing the court by video from the prison where she was being detained, she confirmed newspaper reports that she had been on hunger strike and added: "Even though I live in Mali, I have always responded to Belgian legal authorities."
